title: Gianluca95
author: Gianluca95
content: Hi there guys,Since I've seen what happened to Coinplay, my question was: Why we should play with minor gambling platform, and not use only gambling platform like Stake, CloudBet, fortunejack ecc. which ensure us good games, 100% of safety in terms of withdrawal and provably fair (about games)? This question is also for the owners of gambling platform, maybe they can help to reply it.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: I actually for something like this it doesn't really matter whether it's a big or small gamble but of course there are a number of things to pay attention to and the most basic is reputation. As long as they have a good reputation I don't have a problem with it but if it doesn't make me comfortable with the reputation they have I certainly won't look at things like this.The Coinplay case might be one of the lessons learned (again).On the other hand, I also just want to apply that even though gambling is something that has a certain risk of loss, but on the other hand I don't want to be reckless when choosing a casino site because indeed this can be said to be a basis that must be known because even though gambling is bad, of course fraud in gambling is something worse.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: If asked why we have to play on a small gambling platform, maybe it's because we need new experience on the game side or it could also be to seek luck on that gambling platform, but sometimes playing on a small gambling platform is always vulnerable to fraud, so most old gamblers often avoid new platforms, let alone platforms. little gamble.I am a person who likes to find new experiences on small gambling platforms, usually playing to test games only, make a small deposit and play according to a fee that I can afford to lose, beginners should not do that because they are vulnerable to fraud so it's best to avoid unless you want to play with risk, after all, there are still many large gambling platforms that are safer to try than small gambling platforms that are prone to the risk of fraud.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: If Chipmixer doesn't get seized and still operated until now, I have a counter question "why we should use minor mixer platform?"You've managed few small casinos in the last year and some of them turn become scam, as a campaign manager why you're want to promote small casinos when you're don't know how trusted the sites?Your question aren't make any sense, it's simply like saying new project has no place no compete or overtake the old project.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on April 16, 2023, 09:21:46 AMHi there guys,Since I've seen what happened to Coinplay, my question was: Why we should play with minor gambling platform, and not use only gambling platform like Stake, CloudBet, fortunejack ecc. which ensure us good games, 100% of safety in terms of withdrawal and provably fair (about games)? This question is also for the owners of gambling platform, maybe they can help to reply it.Maybe this question come out because we are at the time when we have so many popular and trusted casinos already. How if we are at the time when all casinos are still new? all the sites you mentioned above were minor gambling platform as well at the beginning. Playing on minor/new gambling site is fine as long as we know how to choose which one looks good enough. Coming up to the chance of something bad (scam or something else), it may happened also in major/old reputable casinos. Do you remember the history of Safedice? It was a great reputable site but they were gone badly.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: To be fair, even the most popular gambling sites may experience glitches and have also their fair share of questionable decisions. They don't have spotless reputations. Trusted they may be, the likes of Cloudbet, Fortunejack, and others cannot actually guarantee us of 100% smooth experience. Although, of course, brands like them are still a lot more worth of our trust than those who don't have the track record yet like Coinplay. But I understand those who are trying to explore options and new and better features. The competition among crypto gambling platforms is getting stronger and stronger. New platforms are born every now and then offering a new kind of experience. The risk, though, is high with these new players in the industry.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on April 16, 2023, 09:21:46 AMWhy we should play on minor gambling platform?Life is about reputation and trustworthiness. Assuming you know someone to be good and trustworthy while other people like you are also referring the person to be good. Is that not enough for you to consider doing business with the person after you further research and also pointing to the direction of the person to be a good person and reliable. If you see another person that is not yet known to the community, would that be the person you will do business with? Although anything can happen, but people prefer to going for reputable sites.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on April 16, 2023, 09:21:46 AMHi there guys,Since I've seen what happened to Coinplay, my question was: Why we should play with minor gambling platform, and not use only gambling platform like Stake, CloudBet, fortunejack ecc. which ensure us good games, 100% of safety in terms of withdrawal and provably fair (about games)? This question is also for the owners of gambling platform, maybe they can help to reply it.Give them the benefit of the doubt, usually the start up gambling site also gives more rewards and bonuses so they can attract more players, you might wanna take advantage of that, just be ready for the possible risk since new sites are more prone to rug pull or a scam site. Many gamblers want's to try other platform and find their luck there, if you are ok with the minor casinos considering you do your own research for that, then it should be no problem at all.

comments.author: Tumanggor
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on April 16, 2023, 09:21:46 AMHi there guys,Since I've seen what happened to Coinplay, my question was: Why we should play with minor gambling platform, and not use only gambling platform like Stake, CloudBet, fortunejack ecc. which ensure us good games, 100% of safety in terms of withdrawal and provably fair (about games)? This question is also for the owners of gambling platform, maybe they can help to reply it.why do you have to rule out the possibility of new competitors in the online gambling business appearing, even online gambling sites that are already big now start from user distrust but they are successful in dealing with users and maintaining their reputationRegarding coinplay, I don't know what really happened to them, but each gambling site has its own system. Apart from that, we cannot fully blame the owner of the gambling business because it is possible for users to try to cheat but end up having bad luck until their accounts are locked

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on April 16, 2023, 09:21:46 AMHi there guys,Since I've seen what happened to Coinplay, my question was: Why we should play with minor gambling platform, and not use only gambling platform like Stake, CloudBet, fortunejack ecc. which ensure us good games, 100% of safety in terms of withdrawal and provably fair (about games)? This question is also for the owners of gambling platform, maybe they can help to reply it.Why we should not, they offer bonuses and giveaways and they are a new player in the industry and wants to build up their reputation and another casino of choice for players, there is a saying the more the merrier and it applies to the gambling industry as well, these top online casino platforms started small they work their way up, done massive advertising,Did everything to keep their reputation and brand clean, we feel proud in knowing that we have supported a top casino that once was a small and struggling casino.I have no issue supporting newly launched casinos as long they do the right thing and are fair to their players.

comments.author: sashapan
comments.body: Because we always want something new, new design, new games, new features As it seems to us....Â  And we can not immediately know that this is a second-rate site, even if we heard somewhere that the site has a bad reputation anyway we are relying on their experience goes to check it

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Trying to have a new experience is what make some gamblers to try new casinos. I don't like changing casino,I only game on two casinos because they have good reputation and they are 90% trustworthy. In cases like gambling, it is a most that some casinos won't be able to meet up to the services that they claim to render. While some casinos had in at the back of their minds that they are doing the business in other to scam their customers. It is good that we learn how to stick to a casino that you already have their trust and reputation to avoid becoming a victim to scammers.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: It's true that their security and bankroll or even withdrawal process may still be questionnable but I think it's more on the promotions and bonuses these new casinos offer to attract more users that compels other gamblers to atleast try.It's also nice to see more competition in the gambling market as it pushes old casinos to reinvent and step up.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: It's much better to stick to websites that have proven to reward their members nicely rather than a small site giving you small value for your money.This article explains why i.e. some sites allow you to grab $2000+ risk free and that's why being with them long term is worth it:https://gamblingfreebies.com/2023/04/16/how-to-make-2000-or-more-risk-free/

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: It's on the gambler's character to always check for something new, we gamblers have been doing this even when there is no internet we are casino hopping and when we go to a new town we always check its casino for comparison and experience, we have carried this practice even online, the only difference is we checked the casino's interface, features, TOS and of course reputation, new online casinos for gamblers are new challenges so they welcome new casinos with open arms and will continue to support as long as they keep their reputation intact.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: it sucks that there are people getting scammed from new gambling sites but trying and playing out new gambling sites is one of the ways to know whether they are actually paying their gamblers and is not a scam casino. if we stick to the logic that we should only play on platforms that are very well known and has a very good reputation and is known to not scam their gamblers, then all the gambling site you mentioned wouldn't be here right now.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on April 16, 2023, 09:21:46 AMHi there guys,Why we should play with minor gambling platform, and not use only gambling platform like Stake, CloudBet, fortunejack ecc. which ensure us good games, 100% of safety in terms of withdrawal and provably fair (about games)? Big casinos were small at first... You are a legendary member, you must remember the days when all the big names in the crypto gambling industry were starting out and taking their first steps. I gave a chance to most of them and I still play in some of them. I often give a chance to some new casino, and why not? I would use StarBets as an example, a relatively new casino and I am active there almost from the start (like I was active in many big casinos from the start), they have a nice story with dividends (something I like) and until now everything there works fine, without any problems when it comes to withdrawals, and like many other fair crypto casinos they also have provably fair games that can be tested.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: The fact that something happened to one of the reputable casinos does not mean we should abandon all the big casinos and focus on a small/minor casino.if something shouuld happen to electrum for example does that mean we should abandon other wallet that have in the system and hav ealso been doing extremely well since they got into the ecosystem?If you're not okay with big casinos you can migratae ato minor ones noone id going to judge you, after all you don't owe anyone anything, but you shouldn't try to convince others to do the same.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Because a gambling platform is still small those not mean we shouldnât use them, the only thing we should first confirm is the reputation on the gambling platform, if the gambling platform is trusted then we can be using them. All the gambling platforms that you mentioned are already big gambling platforms but they also started as small gambling platforms, so I donât think their is different between both big and small gambling platforms, since the small gambling platforms are also trusted.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on April 16, 2023, 09:21:46 AMHi there guys,Since I've seen what happened to Coinplay, my question was: Why we should play with minor gambling platform, and not use only gambling platform like Stake, CloudBet, fortunejack ecc. which ensure us good games, 100% of safety in terms of withdrawal and provably fair (about games)? This question is also for the owners of gambling platform, maybe they can help to reply it.I have never understood people who keep playing on those platforms when the huge ones can offer you better possibilities in terms of everything,better bonuses the first one who will keep coming to you every week and month,a huge player base which in terms can be translated with more people playing and as such more opportunities for us to hit a big win as when a lot of players are playing the same slot we know that the huge payouts will come and one of us will get it.If something happens to one big one does not mean that it will happen to other ones,beside that we have the ANN threads here and the ones who have ongoing positive feedback it means that we can play worry free there at this platform.
